mapper.insert: insert into lckgoods(name, image, ticketCount, productCount) values(#{name}, #{image}, #{ticketCount}, #{productCount})
mapper.select: select * from lckgoods order by idx desc
mapper.update: update lckgoods set productCount = productCount + 1 where idx = #{idx}
update lckgoods set productCount = productCount - 1 where idx = #{idx}
update lckgoods set productCount = productCount - 1, saled = saled + 1 where idx = #{idx} and productCount > 0
